node_name.C: 孩子高中毕业的可能性

Data.text_description:
The probability of parental involvement in child's education being high (A=1) is 0.3382. 
For those with parental involvement in child's education being low (A=0), the probability of child's academic performance being excellent (B=1) is 0.6794. 
For those with parental involvement in child's education being high (A=1), the probability of child's academic performance being excellent (B=1) is 0.9689. 
For those with child's academic performance being poor (B=0) and parental involvement in child's education being low (A=0), the probability of likelihood of the child graduating from high school being likely (C=1) is 0.4999. 
For those with child's academic performance being poor (B=0) and parental involvement in child's education being high (A=1), the probability of likelihood of the child graduating from high school being likely (C=1) is 0.6799. 
For those with child's academic performance being excellent (B=1) and parental involvement in child's education being low (A=0), the probability of likelihood of the child graduating from high school being likely (C=1) is 0.8883. 
For those with child's academic performance being excellent (B=1) and parental involvement in child's education being high (A=1), the probability of likelihood of the child graduating from high school being likely (C=1) is 0.9441. 
For those with child's academic performance being poor (B=0), the probability of likelihood of the child attending college being likely (D=1) is 0.9043. 
For those with child's academic performance being excellent (B=1), the probability of likelihood of the child attending college being likely (D=1) is 0.9889.
